languages.text: "И впрямь. Что он — готи, что ты — готи... Когда от вашего племени порчей-то не пахло".
"Yes, you are right. Gothis, both of you. As if there was ever a time when your ilk did not stink of plague."
languages.original_text: "И впрямь. Что он — готи, что ты — готи... Когда от вашего племени порчей-то не пахло".

traits.locale_text: "Yes, you are right. Gothis, both of you. As if there has ever been a time when your ilk did not smell of plague."
"Yes, you are right. Gothis, both of you. As if there has ever been a time when your ilk did not smell of plague."
"Yes, you are right. Gothis, both of you. As if there was ever a time when your ilk did not stink of plague."
"Yes, you are right. Gothis, both of you. As if there was ever a time when your ilk did not stink of plague."
"Yes, you are right. Gothis, both of you. As if there was ever a time when your ilk did not stink of plague."
"Yes, you are right. Gothis, both of you. As if there was ever a time when your ilk did not stink of plague."
"Yes, you are right. Gothis, both of you. As if there was ever a time when your ilk did not stink of plague."

languages.text: "Ja, Ihr habt recht. Gothis, alle beide. Als hätte es je eine Zeit gegeben, in der Euresgleichen nicht nach Fäulnis gestunken hat."
languages.original_text: "Yes, you are right. Gothis, both of you. As if there was ever a time when your ilk did not stink of plague."

traits.locale_text: "Ja, Ihr habt recht. Gothis, alle beide. Als hätte es je eine Zeit gegeben, in der Euresgleichen nicht nach Fäulnis gestunken hat."

languages.text: « Tout à fait. Vous êtes des gothis, l'un comme l'autre. Les individus de votre acabit sont une source constante d'ennuis en tout genre. »
languages.original_text: "Yes, you are right. Gothis, both of you. As if there was ever a time when your ilk did not stink of plague."

traits.locale_text: « Tout à fait. Vous êtes des gothis, l'un comme l'autre. Les individus de votre acabit sont une source constante d'ennuis en tout genre. »

languages.text: «Efectivamente, tienes razón. Vaya par de gothis. Como si hubiera alguno que no apeste a plaga».
languages.original_text: "Yes, you are right. Gothis, both of you. As if there was ever a time when your ilk did not stink of plague."

traits.locale_text: «Efectivamente, tienes razón. Vaya par de gothis. Como si hubiera alguno que no apeste a plaga».

languages.text: 「ゴーティス、お前は正しい。二人とも正しい。 まるで、お前の同類の臭いがしなかった時代があったかのようだ」
languages.original_text: "Yes, you are right. Gothis, both of you. As if there was ever a time when your ilk did not stink of plague."

traits.locale_text: 「ゴーティス、お前は正しい。二人とも正しい。 まるで、お前の同類の臭いがしなかった時代があったかのようだ」

languages.text: “是啊，你说得对。差不多得了，你们两个，说得就好像你们这种人身上从来都没有瘟疫的臭味一样。”
languages.original_text: "Yes, you are right. Gothis, both of you. As if there was ever a time when your ilk did not stink of plague."

traits.locale_text: “是啊，你说得对。差不多得了，你们两个，说得就好像你们这种人身上从来都没有瘟疫的臭味一样。”

languages.original_text: "Yes, you are right. Gothis, both of you. As if there was ever a time when your ilk did not stink of plague."

languages.text: "Evet, haklısın. İkiniz de Gothi kılıklısınız. Sanki senin türünün de leş gibi hastalık kokmadığı bir dönem oldu da..."
languages.original_text: "Yes, you are right. Gothis, both of you. As if there was ever a time when your ilk did not stink of plague."
